sqlMap.select: SELECT SUM(distance) AS Expr1 FROM tb_carbon_value
select * from tb_carbon_value order by updateTime

select equipment_code, (carbon_value*consumption*conversion_factor*ton_factor*44/12) as carbon_value, equipment_type_name, carbon_value as distance from (select equipment_code, carbon_value, equiptable.equipment_type_code, tb_equipment_type.equipment_type_name, tb_equipment_type.consumption, tb_equipment_type.energy_code from (select sumtable.equipment_code, sumtable.carbon_value, tb_equipment.equipment_type_code from (select equipment_code, sum(distance) as carbon_value from tb_carbon_value group by equipment_code ) as sumtable, tb_equipment where sumtable.equipment_code= tb_equipment.equipment_code) as equiptable, tb_equipment_type where equiptable.equipment_type_code=tb_equipment_type.equipment_type_code) as enegytable, tb_carbon_factor where enegytable.energy_code = tb_carbon_factor.energy_code

select equipment_type_code,equipment_type_name, (distance*consumption*conversion_factor*ton_factor*44/12) as carbon_value, distance from (select sumtable.equipment_type_code, distance, energy_code, tb_equipment_type.consumption, equipment_type_name from ( select equipment_type_code,
sum(distance) as distance from (select tb_carbon_value.equipment_code, distance, tb_equipment.equipment_type_code from tb_carbon_value,tb_equipment where tb_carbon_value.equipment_code= tb_equipment.equipment_code) as valuetable group by equipment_type_code) as sumtable, tb_equipment_type where sumtable.equipment_type_code = tb_equipment_type.equipment_type_code) as resulttable, tb_carbon_factor where resulttable.energy_code=tb_carbon_factor.energy_code
sqlMap.insert: insert into tb_carbon_value ( equipment_code, updateTime, area_id, distance,equipment_name, value_id ) values (#equipment_code#, #updateTime#, #area_id#, #distance#, #equipment_name#, #value_id#)
